name: Swordlock
description:
In the ruins of a destroyed city, a Swordlock triumphs.

Made in 72 hours for MiniJam 114!

If you experience significant lag playing on HTML, please download a version for your OS for buttery smooth gameplay.

Note: if something breaks, please let me know in the comments! "R" can be used to refresh the level if something weird happens. Additionally, because this is the game jam release, you can use "Esc" to skip a level if you wish. 

Rolf, last of the Swordlocks, sets out on a quest to retrieve ancient harddrives buried within the crumbles of the world capital.

Ralph, the BeetleBot, tags along! He uh, spins?
